entry.title: blog post about important Thoughts and Feelings

link.title: blog post about important Thoughts and Feelings

entry.content:
hello again people&respective machines

09/28> i've decided that a blog where other humans can choose if they want to consume what i expel into the void is better than inhabiting social platforms for the time being. so i will be posting a web of thoughts/projects/in progress work into the mindscape from time to time. thanks for coming xo

btw this>landscapes from another world is my favorite blog rn other than my blog. serafin alvarez is a real genius human imo & has a lot of cool blogs/projects.
entry.summary: hello again people&respective machines 09/28> i've decided that a blog where other humans can choose if they want to consume what i expel into the void is better than inhabiting social platforms for the time being. so i will be posting a web of thoughts/projects/in progress work into the mindscape from time to time. thanks for coming xo btw this>landscapes from another world is my favorite blog rn other than my blog. serafin alvarez is a real genius human imo & has a lot of cool blogs/projects.

entry.title: a selected overview
entry.content:
2019-present
front-end development/graphic design for stephanie dinkins

2019-present
virtual reality development for mapa de cuauhtinchan project in collaboration with davíd carrasco, laana carrasco, and stewart bird

2018-present
graphic design for bar laika by e-flux

2017-present
virtual reality development for brad necyk

2017-2019
game development on the lost garden with scott smallwood and nico arnaez


jessa previously was in school for fine arts (bfa, honors in art history), in canada from 2013-2017 & you can email them for an extensive cv if you wish

entry.title: welcome
entry.content:
welcome to jessa gillespie's platform

jessa is an artist, writer, and technologist living in brooklyn, new york. their work primarily takes the form of video games, virtual reality, and animation. they love tomb raider, would prefer voluntary association, and hate cops.

jessa is very good at cinema4d & unity, and is pretty good at daz, iclone, ableton live, cycling max, zbrush, blender, photoshop, after effects, premiere, and indesign. they also are familiar with html, c#, and javascript.
pls feel free to contact them below with any questions, concerns, or paid labor.


Your Name: Email Address: Message:

this email submit form doesn't work yet so just email them at jessagillespie@gmail.com until they learn html
